ValidationRule.description: The Date Trade Verified cannot be entered unless ORM Approved or RC1 Posted(or CRW Posted) is entered. ORM is for Checks record type, CRW is for Wires record type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(NOT(ISBLANK( Date_Trade_Verified__c)),ORM_Approved__c = false,NOT(ISPICKVAL(Transmission_Method__c,'ACH 401k')),
OR(
AND( RecordType.Name = '401k Incoming Checks and ACHs',ISBLANK( RC1_Posted__c )),
AND( RecordType.Name = '401k Incoming Wires',ISBLANK( CRW_Posted__c ))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Date Trade Verified cannot be entered unless ORM Approved or RC1 Posted(or CRW Posted) is entered
